channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 18:40 The threat of artobrats to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 🟡 18:40 The threat of artobrats to Pokrovskaya territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#Pokrovskay This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
